Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing an office of nightlife and a nightlife advisory board
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing an office of nightlife and a nightlife advisory board.

Items.Title: Communication from the City Council – Recalling Introduction number 1648-A, in relation to establishing an office of nightlife and a nightlife advisory board.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
